title: Cooku with Comali
description: Remember what happens when an amateur teams up with a celebrity chef? Ventakesh Bhat and Damu are back with another season of this comic cookery with a twist!

title: The Falcon and The Winter Soldier
description: NEW EPISODE EVERY FRIDAY AT 12:30 PM. Following the events of “Avengers: Endgame,” Sam Wilson and Bucky Barnes team up in a global adventure that tests their abilities and their patience.

title: Barathi Kannamma
description: MAHASANGAMAM EPS AVAILABLE ON RAJA RANI 2 PAGE. In a society where women get stereotyped basis appearances, will Kannamma and Barathi manage to break these boundaries and make a beautiful life for themselves?

title: Pandian Stores
description: Sathyamoorthy and his wife Dhanalakshmi sacrifice a lot to raise his brothers Kathir, Jeeva and Kannan. Will things change when the brothers get married?

title: Naam Iruvar
description: Maha is a strong-headed woman whereas Mayan is a rowdy who falls in love with her. Their life takes a dramatic turn when she has to marry him against her will.

title: Baakiyalakshmi
description: Life with a husband and three grown-up children seemed to be smooth-sailing until Baakiyalakshmi realises that she is a puppet in their hands. Is it too late for her to carve an identity of her own?

title: Raja Rani 2
description: Saravana is a confectioner by profession, whose mother wants a housewife for him. But what if he marries an ambitious woman? Whose dreams will he support?

title: Kaatrukkenna Veli
description: Vennila leaves her wedding altar to pursue her dreams. Her path becomes challenging when she meets Surya, who hates his mother for choosing her career over him.

title: Paramapadham Vilayattu
description: A mother or a doctor - what will Gayathri choose to be when she's caught in a web of political conspiracies after a politician in her care is murdered?

title: Mouna Raagam 2
description: Separated by fate, Karthik and Sakthi's paths cross yet again. But will history repeat itself or will the father-daughter duo finally reunite?

title: Eeramaana Rojaave
description: When Malar is finally about to marry the love of her life, fate plays a cruel game with her, leaving her stuck at crossroads.

title: Shin-chan
description: Shin-chan follows the journey of five-year-old, Shinnosuke "Shin" Nohara and his family, his pet dog Shiro, neighbours, and friends in Kasukabe, Japan.

title: Doraemon
description: Trouble seems to follow Nobita around. Fortunately for him, he’s got Doraemon, a trusty cat-type robot from the 22nd century.

title: Thaenmozhi B.A
description: Thaenmozhi, a pint-sized version of a spunky, quirky woman ends up becoming the head of her village by accident. Will she live up to everyone's expectations?

title: Senthoora Poove
description: Forthe sake of his children, a middle-aged Durai marries Roja, who is half his age. Will this marriage of convenience turn into their 'happily ever after'?

title: Super Singer
description: Join the Super Singer stars in the melodious battle of the century! Contestants give existing songs a twist to become the ultimate singing champion.

title: Raja Paarvai
description: Resourceful Charu will do anything for her family, including reluctantly marrying Anand, a rich blind guy who falls for her. Will he make her heart flutter?

title: Mahabharatham
description: The legendary rivalry of the Pandavas and Kauravas culminates in Kurukshetra as this epic war, driven by the sharp strategies of Krishna, the master puppeteer.

title: The Legend of Hanuman
description: When the power-hungry Ravan tore through the world to unleash evil, in his way stood a humble vaanar awoken to his divinity to become an immortal legend.

title: Velammal
description: A courageous warrior, a hero and the first queen to fight the East India Company. Above all, Velu Nachiyar was also a daughter who craved her father's approval.

title: Special Ops
description: One is a relentless hero, the other is a terror mastermind. In a race against time, Himmat Singh and his team are on a mission to end a nineteen-year long manhunt.

title: Hostages
description: Reneging on the deal to kill the CM, Prithvi plans to smuggle him to Nepal but ends up in a hostage crisis again. Amid threats old and new, a conspiracy unfolds.

title: Anbudan Kushi
description: Born in a conservative family, an ambitious Kushi is married off to a middle-class boy, Anbudan. Will he support Kushi and give wings to her dreams?

title: OK Computer
description: When a self-driving car commits murder, a cyber cop and a robot rights activist team up to investigate. Who is to be held accountable? Can we really trust AI?

title: Criminal Justice: Behind Closed Doors
description: Anuradha Chandra stabs her perfect lawyer husband one fateful night and confesses to her crime. However, it is anything but an open-and-shut case.

title: Aarya
description: Aarya Sareen's blissful family life is jeopardised when greed consumes her loved ones. With crime as her legacy, can she escape from what she hates the most?

title: Selfie with Bajrangi
description: Ankush's life changes when he meets a mysterious nine-year-old child named Bajrangi, who is visible to nobody but him. Together, they learn the importance of togetherness, friendship, and trust.

title: Criminal Justice
description: A one-night stand turns into a nightmare when Aditya wakes up covered in blood. All evidence is against him, but he doesn't remember anything. Is he guilty?

title: Paavam Ganesan
description: Ganesan, who lets the world walk over him, gets burdened with the responsibility of his family. What does fate have in store for this paavam young man?

title: Live Telecast
description: TV show director Jenifer Matthew will do anything to win the TRP game, and a supposedly haunted house in a sleepy hill station may just be her golden ticket.

title: Sofia The First
description: Sofia, an adventurous little girl becomes a princess overnight after her mom marries the king.

title: Bigg Boss
description: Friendships and enmity will be tested again with high-octane drama and controversies. Stay tuned for yet another season of Bigg Boss

title: Velaikkaran
description: Loyal servant Velan's life flips on his 30th birthday when he becomes the heir to his master's empire. How will he navigate this changed power dynamics?

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: After the devastating events of the Infinity War, the Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos’ actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: Neeya Naana
description: A talk show where two polarised groups of society are given the platform to share their views and see a different perspective on socially-relevant topics.

title: Vijay TV Awards
description: Join the cast of Star Vijay's most popular shows for an entertaining awards night and a roller coaster of emotions as you root for your favourites!

title: Phineas and Ferb
description: Phineas and Ferb embark on various adventures during their summer vacation, while trying to keep their sister from interfering with their plans.

title: Kaatrin Mozhi
description: Kanmani, a mute girl, only longs for the affection of her cold and distant father, and is oblivious to Santhosh's love for her. How will their life shape up?

title: Kaariyavadhi
description: An orphan named White enters Ongole market to start a new life. Little does he know that he is going to be hit by a life-changing blast from the past.

title: Marvel's Ultimate Spider-Man
description: Spider-man's greatest enemies are back and he needs a new team: a team put together by Spider-man himself including Agent Venom, Iron Spider and Scarlet Spider.
